pageTitle: Public events for December 8, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, December 8, 2015:

Gatineau

9:00 a.m.  – The Prime Minister addresses the Assembly of First Nations Special Chiefs Assembly being held in Gatineau, Quebec.

Hilton Lac-Leamy Hotel - Main ballroom
3, boulevard du Casino
Gatineau, Quebec

 Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive before 8:30 a.m.
  • Media are encouraged to register in advance by emailing the AFN contacts listed below. Media may also register on-site.

AFN contact information:

Alain Garon AFN Communications Officer 613-241-6789, ext 382; 613-292-0857 or agaron@afn.ca

Jenna Young Castro, AFN Communications Officer, 613-241-6789, ext 401; 613-314-8157 or jyoung@afn.ca

Ottawa

11 a.m. – The Prime Minister holds a Cabinet meeting. A media availability will follow in the Foyer of the House of Commons.

Foyer of the House of Commons
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

 PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
